name: part_003
file: tmp_【ゲスト／ときのそら＆雪花ラミィ】歌って笑って♪ウィンターminiライブ #ノムlive【燦鳥ノムpresents】 [FXCO0xHl8R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Yukihana Lamy performs a song on stage with winter-themed visuals.
Transition scene with stage lights and snowflake effects.
Tokino Sora begins her solo performance on stage.

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん 世界で一番可愛くなるのは
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, mirror on the wall, to become the most beautiful in the world—

subtitles.original: やめてよ 棘のような視線迫る
subtitles.english: Stop it, those thorn-like gazes are closing in.

subtitles.original: 優しいふりした彼女が 素敵な晩餐もてなした
subtitles.english: She, who pretended to be kind, served a wonderful dinner.

subtitles.original: そっと口に含むと
subtitles.english: As I gently take a bite...

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 薄れゆく 意識の中で
subtitles.english: Ah... within my fading consciousness...

subtitles.original: 夢を見てる いつかのお伽話 時が止まる
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming. Like an old fairy tale, time stands still.

subtitles.original: お願いキスで 目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a kiss.

subtitles.original: 白い棺から 連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if to take me away from the white coffin.

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは ドラマティックな地上を
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred traverses the dramatic earth.

subtitles.original: 祈っても君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, you still don't come.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん ネクタイ任せや頬にアイサツするから
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, mirror on the wall, since I'll leave the tie to you and greet your cheek...

subtitles.original: 妬みも変わってしまった
subtitles.english: Even the jealousy has changed.

subtitles.original: 7人の小人はいるけれど 助ける素振り知らんぷりね
subtitles.english: The seven dwarves are there, but they feign ignorance of any attempt to help.

subtitles.original: そっと首を掴まれ
subtitles.english: With my neck gently grasped...

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 一粒の 涙さえも
subtitles.english: Ah... even a single tear...

subtitles.original: 拭えなくて 呼吸もままならない 世界捨てた
subtitles.english: I couldn't wipe it away, I could hardly breathe, I threw away the world.

subtitles.original: 凍えそうだから 早く駆けてほしいの
subtitles.english: I'm about to freeze, so I want you to run to me quickly.

subtitles.original: 理由は聞かないで 答えられない
subtitles.english: Don't ask why, I can't answer.

subtitles.original: 望まない憎まれは 深い愛の地上を
subtitles.english: Unwanted resentment traverses the earth of deep love.

subtitles.original: もうすぐでいなくなるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll be gone soon.

subtitles.original: 途切れてゆく 命の音
subtitles.english: The sound of life is fading away.

subtitles.original: 毒リンゴを 食した少女のように 眠りにつく
subtitles.english: Falling asleep like the girl who ate the poisoned apple.

subtitles.original: お願いキスで 目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a kiss.

subtitles.original: 胸の奥の声 届きますか
subtitles.english: Does the voice from the depth of my heart reach you?

subtitles.original: 階段を登ったら ドアを開けるだけで
subtitles.english: If you climb the stairs, just by opening the door...

subtitles.original: 見つかるよ 嗚呼
subtitles.english: I'll be found. Ah...

subtitles.original: お願いキスで 目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a kiss.

subtitles.original: 白い棺から 連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if to take me away from the white coffin.

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは ドラマティックな地上を
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred traverses the dramatic earth.

subtitles.original: 祈っても君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, you still don't come.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 消えてしまう
subtitles.english: Ah... I'm going to disappear...

subtitles.original: その前に
subtitles.english: Before that happens.

subtitles.original: くるりくるりよ
subtitles.english: Spinning round and round—

subtitles.original: アップスアンドダウンズ
subtitles.english: Ups and downs.
